title: Healthy ageing, simulated.Colourful epidemiology, minus the beige.
text:
I’m Andrew Kingston — chartered statistician and epidemiologist. I build
        microsimulations (PACSim), teach applied epidemiology and data science, and
        help teams turn messy longitudinal data into clear decisions.
